Fighter

An extensible micro-framework for HackLang

Home Install Docs View on GitHub

What is Fighter

Fighter is a fast, simple and testable framework for HackLang. Fighter enables you to quickly and easily build RESTful web applications.

<?hh //partial
require __DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php';

$app = new Fighter\Application();
$app->route('/', () ==> 'Hello World');

$app->run();

Fighter is clone of Flight

Support or Contact

Having trouble with Fighter? Check out Fighter repo.
